synopsis.text: The anime, based on Kodama Kawajirji's essay manga, invites viewers into the laid-back, indulgent world of its female protagonist, Kawashiri. With a penchant for all things alcoholic and a weakness for greasy, salty, and sweet delicacies, Kawashiri's daily life is a testament to her unapologetic love for culinary indulgence. Originally debuting on Twitter in 2020, the series doesn't shy away from portraying Kawashiri's relaxed, less-than-healthy lifestyle, offering a unique and entertaining perspective on life's simple pleasures.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
